title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - Roadmap updates - what to expect the coming months
description:
In this video, we will delve into the updated roadmap, examine bug reports, and review the list of most requested features. The roadmap has been refreshed with some unexpected additions, promising exciting developments in the weeks and months leading up to November.

So, sit back, relax, and prepare to be amazed!
